Interface

ThrottleOptions

ThrottleOptions

Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
leading boolean <optional>
 Whether to allow the function to be called on the leading edge of the wait timeout.
trailing boolean <optional>
 Whether to allow the function to be called on the trailing edge of the wait timeout.
